sources.title: The Comancheros (1961) John Wayne · Stuart Whitman
sources.description: A Texas Ranger captain battles warlike Native Americans and their white arms supplier in 1843. A Western with a dense atmosphere and outstanding landscape shots; excitingly staged, consistently spiced with humor and irony.   The last film by Michael Curtiz (1888-1962)

metadata.Plot: Texas Ranger Jake Cutter arrests gambler Paul Regret, but soon finds himself teamed with his prisoner in an undercover effort to defeat a band of renegade arms merchants and thieves dealing with the Comanches known as Comancheros.
metadata.Writer: James Edward Grant, Clair Huffaker, Paul Wellman
metadata.Actors: John Wayne, Stuart Whitman, Ina Balin
